text:
Chewy Engineering | Boston, MA | Full time/onsite:

Senior Java Engineers & Full Stack Engineers:

https://www.chewy.com/jobs/position/1224285?gh_jid=1224285

hewy is hiring for our Customer Technology team in Boston, Massachusetts. This is a high-profile position that will have exposure across the entire business, influencing the vision and implementation of designs and features for this critical platform. As part of a dynamic team, this role offers a tremendous opportunity for professional growth in the leading online pet retailer in the US.
